categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Wrad was a male Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. Following the death of Empress Vaylin and formation of the Eternal Alliance in 3630 BBY, he joined an Imperial splinter faction led by renegade Sith Lords Adacin and Zanisk. They tasked him with killing the intruders into the base they set in the former Separatist stronghold on Ord Mantell, but Wrad was overpowered and killed.
Lord Wrad appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as a mini-boss during the "Inferno" Uprising.
